contentrichtext.text: The '''Union of the Democratic Centre''' ({{lang-es|Unión del Centro Democrático}} - UCeDé) is a conservative [[political party]] in [[Argentina]]. It was founded in 1982 by [[Álvaro Alsogaray]] who stood for the Party in the 1983 and 1989 presidential elections. In subsequent presidential elections, the UCeDé has endorsed [[Carlos Menem]] and other right-wing [[Justicialist Party|Justicialists]]. ==External links== *[http://www.ucedeavellaneda.com.ar/ Official web site] {{Argentine political parties}} <references /> [[Category:Liberal-conservative parties in Argentina]] {{Argentina-party-stub}}
